title: Revelry
description: He is always aware of where she is and what she is doing. Bella makes sure that Edward’s eyes are only on her…grabbing his attention every chance she can. She is in need of constant allegiance…it’s fucked but works for them.Complete, Romance/Hurt/Comfort, 26 chapters, BPOV, EPOV, JasPOV, APOV.
author: TeamBella23
